poemsDataJson.list_full: みかの原(はら) わきて流(なが)るる いづみ川(がは) いつ見(み)きとてか 恋(こひ)しかるらむ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Over Mika's plain,//Gushing forth and flowing free,//Is Izumi's stream.//I do not know if we have met://Why, then, do I long for her?
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Mika no Hara|Wakite nagaruru|Izumi-gawa|Itsu miki tote ka|Koishi karu ran
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: いつみきとてか こひしかるらむ
poemsDataJson.author: 中納言兼輔(ちゅうなごんかねすけ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: まだ見ぬ女性に対する強い恋心の不思議さ
